channel.title: Lagrangians to Lasers
channel.description: This website is a virtual proof that I'm awesome

item.title: Can ML Accelerate Particle Simulations?
item.description: Experimental High Energy Physics - Over the last decade, machine learning techniques have been widely adopted by various domains in particle physics. I will discuss using such ML algorithms and simulations in particle physics analysis and the challenges they present. Then, I will introduce a new approach I have been working on, explaining how I...
